Name: Rust
Description:
Overview

Rust is a game from Facepunch Studios, the creators of Garry's Mod that was first released on Steam Early Access on December 11, 2013. It was fully released on February 8, 2018, and playable on PC, Mac and Linux. The game is a first-person survival title in which the player must start from scratch, with nothing but a rock to serve as a resource gathering tool and weapon, and attempt to survive in a harsh, irradiated wilderness populated with wild animals and other players. In it's initial state Rust was heavily inspired by Day-Z so far as including zombies as enemies, however in February 2014 the zombies were removed and replaced with bears.

Official Website: http://playrust.com/

In May 2021 Rust Console Edition launched on Xbox One and PS4. It was developed and published for Console by UK development studio Double Eleven.

System Requirements

PC

Minimum

  • OS: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: 2 ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Hard Drive: 8 GB available space

Recommended

  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: 3 ghz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 980
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Hard Drive: 10 GB available space

Mac

Minimum

  • OS: OS X Lion 10.7
  • Processor: 2 ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Recommended

  • OS: OS X Mavericks
  • Processor: 3 ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

SteamOS + Linux

Minimum

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

Name: Rust Bucket
Description:
This game is an endless dungeon crawler which pits the unnamed hero against monsters with varying patterns and mechanics.

Controls

The single method of control is swiping in one of four directions, which serves as both movement and attacking, depending on the context.

Modes

Tutorial

The tutorial is comprised of 10 tutorial stages which slowly introduce new mechanics.

Endless

This mode is comprised of procedurally generated "rooms" with a ramping difficulty.

Name: Rust Racers 2D
Description:
Rust Racers 2D is a light-hearted melee brawler based around hauling ass across structurally unsound platforms pushing and smashing other players off the grid.

The first iteration of Rust Racers was a modification for the popular sandbox game Garry's Mod in 2016.

Name: Cosmic Dust & Rust
Description: Available for purchase on Steam for 0.99USD and features Steam Trading Cards.
